t: What Is Amazon Brand Gating? (And How to Protect Your Sales With It)
s: With brand gating on Amazon, you can fight back against counterfeit sellers. The program prevents these sellers from even listing your product (or their knock-off version), which helps your company capture more sales from the marketplace because you’ve eliminated a source of lost sales.
